item.text: The Lord spoke to Moses:

“<st data-num="07971" class="">Send out</st> <st data-num="0582" class="">men</st> to <st data-num="08446" class="">investigate</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st> of <st data-num="03667" class="">Canaan</st>, <st data-num="0834" class="">which</st> <st data-num="0589" class="">I</st> am <st data-num="05414" class="">giving</st><n id="2" /> to the <st data-num="01121 03478">Israelites</st>. You are to <st data-num="07971" class="">send</st> <st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> <st data-num="0376" class="">man</st> from <st data-num="0259" class="">each</st> <st data-num="01" class="">ancestral</st> <st data-num="04294" class="">tribe</st>,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="03605" class="">each one</st> a <st data-num="05387" class="">leader</st> among them.”
So Moses sent them from the wilderness of Paran at the command of the Lord. All of them were leaders of the Israelites.
Now these were their names: from the tribe of Reuben, Shammua son of Zaccur;

from the <st data-num="04294" class="">tribe</st> of <st data-num="08095" class="">Simeon</st>, <st data-num="08202" class="">Shaphat</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="02753" class="">Hori</st>;

from the <st data-num="04294" class="">tribe</st> of <st data-num="03063" class="">Judah</st>, <st data-num="03612" class="">Caleb</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="03312" class="">Jephunneh</st>;

from the <st data-num="04294" class="">tribe</st> of <st data-num="03485" class="">Issachar</st>, <st data-num="03008" class="">Igal</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="03130" class="">Joseph</st>;

from the <st data-num="04294" class="">tribe</st> of <st data-num="0669" class="">Ephraim</st>, <st data-num="01954" class="">Hoshea</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="05126" class="">Nun</st>;

from the <st data-num="04294" class="">tribe</st> of <st data-num="01144" class="">Benjamin</st>, <st data-num="06406" class="">Palti</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="07505" class="">Raphu</st>;

from the <st data-num="04294" class="">tribe</st> of <st data-num="02074" class="">Zebulun</st>, <st data-num="01427" class="">Gaddiel</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="05476" class="">Sodi</st>;

from the <st data-num="04294" class="">tribe</st><n id="1" /> of <st data-num="03130" class="">Joseph</st>, namely, the <st data-num="04294" class="">tribe</st> of <st data-num="04519" class="">Manasseh</st>, <st data-num="01426" class="">Gaddi</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="05485" class="">Susi</st>;

from the <st data-num="04294" class="">tribe</st> of <st data-num="01835" class="">Dan</st>, <st data-num="05988" class="">Ammiel</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="01582" class="">Gemalli</st>;

from the <st data-num="04294" class="">tribe</st> of <st data-num="0836" class="">Asher</st>, <st data-num="05639" class="">Sethur</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="04317" class="">Michael</st>;

from the <st data-num="04294" class="">tribe</st> of <st data-num="05321" class="">Naphtali</st>, <st data-num="05147" class="">Nahbi</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="02058" class="">Vopshi</st>;

from the <st data-num="04294" class="">tribe</st> of <st data-num="01410" class="">Gad</st>, <st data-num="01345" class="">Geuel</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="04352" class="">Maki</st>.
These are the names of the men whom Moses sent to investigate the land. And Moses gave Hoshea son of Nun the name Joshua.
When Moses sent them to investigate the land of Canaan, he told them, “Go up through the Negev, and then go up into the hill country

and <st data-num="07200" class="">see</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="04100" class="">what</st> the <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st> is like,<n id="2" /> and whether the <st data-num="05971" class="">people</st> who <st data-num="03427" class="">live</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">in</st> it are <st data-num="02389" class="">strong</st> or <st data-num="07504" class="">weak</st>, <st data-num="04592" class="">few</st> <st data-num="0518" class="">or</st> <st data-num="07227" class="">many</st>,

and <st data-num="04100" class="">whether</st> the <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st> they <st data-num="03427" class="">live</st> in is <st data-num="02896" class="">good</st> <st data-num="0518" class="">or</st> <st data-num="07451" class="">bad</st>, and <st data-num="04100" class="">whether</st> the <st data-num="05892" class="">cities</st> <st data-num="01931" class="">they</st> <st data-num="03427" class="">inhabit</st> are like <st data-num="04264" class="">camps</st> <st data-num="0518" class="">or</st> <st data-num="04013" class="">fortified cities</st>,
and whether the land is rich or poor, and whether or not there are forests in it. And be brave, and bring back some of the fruit of the land.” Now it was the time of year for the first ripe grapes.
So they went up and investigated the land from the wilderness of Zin to Rehob, at Lebo Hamath.

When they <st data-num="05927" class="">went up</st> through the <st data-num="05045" class="">Negev</st>, they<n id="1" /> <st data-num="0935" class="">came</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="05704" class="">to</st> <st data-num="02275" class="">Hebron</st> <st data-num="08033" class="">where</st> <st data-num="0289" class="">Ahiman</st>, <st data-num="08344" class="">Sheshai</st>, and <st data-num="08526" class="">Talmai</st>,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="03211" class="">descendants</st> of <st data-num="06061" class="">Anak</st>, were living. (Now <st data-num="02275" class="">Hebron</st> had been <st data-num="01129" class="">built</st> <st data-num="07651" class="">seven</st> <st data-num="08141" class="">years</st> <st data-num="06440" class="">before</st> <st data-num="06814" class="">Zoan</st><n id="4" /> in <st data-num="04714" class="">Egypt</st>.)

When they <st data-num="0935" class="">came</st> <st data-num="05704" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="05158" class="">valley</st> of <st data-num="0812" class="">Eshcol</st>, they <st data-num="03772" class="">cut down</st> from <st data-num="08033" class="">there</st> a <st data-num="02156" class="">branch</st> with <st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> <st data-num="0811" class="">cluster</st> of <st data-num="06025" class="">grapes</st>, and they <st data-num="05375" class="">carried</st> it on a <st data-num="04132" class="">staff</st><n id="1" /> between <st data-num="08147" class="">two</st> men, as well as <st data-num="04480" class="">some</st> of the <st data-num="07416" class="">pomegranates</st> and the <st data-num="08384" class="">figs</st>.

<st data-num="01931" class="">That</st> <st data-num="04725" class="">place</st> was <st data-num="07121" class="">called</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="0812" class="">Eshcol</st> <st data-num="05158" class="">Valley</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="05921 0182">because of</st> the <st data-num="0811" class="">cluster</st><n id="3" /> of grapes<n id="4" /> <st data-num="0834" class="">that</st> the <st data-num="01121 03478">Israelites</st> <st data-num="03772" class="">cut</st> from <st data-num="08033" class="">there</st>.
They returned from investigating the land after 40 days.
They came back to Moses and Aaron and to the whole community of the Israelites in the wilderness of Paran at Kadesh. They reported to the whole community and showed the fruit of the land.

They <st data-num="05608 0559">told</st> Moses,<n id="1" /> “We <st data-num="0935" class="">went</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">where</st> you <st data-num="07971" class="">sent</st> us.<n id="2" /> <st data-num="01931" class="">It</st> is <st data-num="01571" class="">indeed</st> <st data-num="02100" class="">flowing</st> with <st data-num="02461" class="">milk</st> and <st data-num="01706" class="">honey</st>,<n id="3" /> and <st data-num="02088" class="">this</st> is its <st data-num="06529" class="">fruit</st>.

<st data-num="0657 03588">But</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="05971 03427 0776">inhabitants</st><n id="2" /> are <st data-num="05794" class="">strong</st>, and the <st data-num="05892" class="">cities</st> are <st data-num="01219" class="">fortified</st> and <st data-num="03966" class="">very</st> <st data-num="01419" class="">large</st>. <st data-num="01571" class="">Moreover</st> we <st data-num="07200" class="">saw</st> the <st data-num="03211" class="">descendants</st> of <st data-num="06061" class="">Anak</st> <st data-num="08033" class="">there</st>.
The Amalekites live in the land of the Negev; the Hittites, Jebusites, and Amorites live in the hill country; and the Canaanites live by the sea and along the banks of the Jordan.”
Then Caleb silenced the people before Moses, saying, “Let us go up and occupy it, for we are well able to conquer it.”

But the <st data-num="0376" class="">men</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="0834" class="">who</st> had <st data-num="05927" class="">gone up</st> <st data-num="05973" class="">with</st> him <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st>, “We <st data-num="03201" class="">are</st> <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="03201" class="">able</st> to <st data-num="05927" class="">go up</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">against</st> these <st data-num="05971" class="">people</st>, <st data-num="03588" class="">because</st> <st data-num="01931" class="">they</st> are <st data-num="02389" class="">stronger</st> <st data-num="04480" class="">than</st> we are!”

Then they <st data-num="03318" class="">presented</st> the <st data-num="01121 03478">Israelites</st> with a <st data-num="01681" class="">discouraging report</st><n id="1" /> of the <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st> they had <st data-num="08446" class="">investigated</st>, <st data-num="0559" class="">saying</st>, “The <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">that</st> we <st data-num="05674" class="">passed through</st><n id="2" /> to <st data-num="08446" class="">investigate</st> is a <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st> that <st data-num="0398" class="">devours</st><n id="3" /> its <st data-num="03427" class="">inhabitants</st>.<n id="4" /> <st data-num="03605" class="">All</st> the <st data-num="05971" class="">people</st> we <st data-num="07200" class="">saw</st> <st data-num="08432" class="">there</st><n id="5" /> are <st data-num="0376 04060">of great stature</st>.
We even saw the Nephilim there (the descendants of Anak came from the Nephilim), and we seemed like grasshoppers both to ourselves and to them.”
